text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222585009 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222589003 (null)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 1222595002 (null)

name: TNMPrimaryTumorCategoryVS
title: TNM Primary Tumor Category Value Set
description: Result values for T category, following AJCC staging guidelines. This value set contains SNOMED-CT equivalents of AJCC codes for the T category, according to AJCC TNM staging rules.
